result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Court confirms address and phone number. DE states he is employed at the Woodshed - Wage Assessment. Court adjourned at 11:05 am.

Information filed with the Court. DE waives further reading of the Information.Defendant pleas not guilty . Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 1:41 pm.

1:PM Defendant William Frederick Gongoll appears in Court, Atty Alex Stormont, ADA Kaley Walker appears for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Stormont states this will be a waiver. Waiver of right to preliminary hearing is given to the court. Court questions DE.   Court finds defendant freely, intelligently and knowingly waives constitutional right to a preliminary hearing. 10:58 AM Defendant William Frederick Gongoll appears in Court, ADA Kaley Walker appeares for the State of Wisconsin. DE states he turned in the PFAC today. ADA Walker is requesting another STC and DE could appear by phone. Court will set a STC and approves DE appearing by phone. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 11:01 am. records.addlTxt: Defendant to maintain Absolute Sobriety.
Def from PCJ

3:20 PM Defendant William Frederick Gongoll appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty Liesl E. Nelson appears by phone, ADA Kaley Walker appears for the State of Wisconsin. DE does not qualify for PD - PFAC from the Jail. Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Walker is requesting a $10,000.00 SIBS w/conditions of AS, no objection. Court so orders. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:27 pm.  Status conference scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 11:00 am.
